title: U.S. trade regulators approve some Apple tariff exemption requests
text:
U.S. trade regulators approve some Apple tariff exemption requests

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 06:21PM ET)

(Reuters) - U.S. trade regulators on Friday approved 10 out of 15 requests for tariff exemptions filed by Apple Inc (NASDAQ: ). Apple did not say why it requested the exemptions, but the requests were for components such as partially completed circuit boards. Apple manufactures its Mac Pro computers in Texas and such intermediate parts were subject to tariffs. Apple did not immediately return a request for comment.

U.S. trade regulators approve some Apple tariff exemption requests
description: U.S. trade regulators approve some Apple tariff exemption requests
